mapper.select: select CO_ID, USER_ID, PSWD_TYPE, PSWD_CHNG_TYPE, PSWD_CHNG_DATE_TIME, PSWD_CHNG_USER_ID from nw101m
mapper.insert: insert into nw101m(CO_ID, USER_ID, PSWD_TYPE, PSWD_CHNG_TYPE, PSWD_CHNG_DATE_TIME, PSWD_CHNG_USER_ID) values (#{coId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pswdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pswdChngType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pswdChngDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{pswdChngUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
